exceptions.tactic: intros V f ptd Hsorted Hlast.
intros V' f ptd Hsorted Hlast.
intros V' f' ptd Hsorted Hlast.
intros V' f' ptd' Hsorted Hlast.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hlast was not found in the current environment.
The LHS of foldr_rcons (foldr _ _ (rcons _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Riemann_sum_rcons (Riemann_sum _ (SF_rcons _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_zero_r (scal _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment V : ModuleSpace R_Ring H6 : forall (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) (l0 : R * R), Riemann_sum f (SF_rcons ptd l0) = plus (Riemann_sum f ptd) (scal (fst l0 - last (SF_h ptd) (unzip1 (SF_t ptd))) (f (snd l0))) f : R -> V ptd : SF_seq H : SF_sorted Rle ptd H0 : SF_h ptd = last (SF_h ptd) (unzip1 (SF_t ptd)) H1 : forall (f0 : ?T0 -> ?T -> ?T) (x0 : ?T) (s : seq ?T0) (t : ?T0), foldr f0 x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f0 (f0 t x0) s H2 : forall (f0 : ?T00 -> ?T0 -> ?T0) (x0 : ?T0) (s : seq ?T00) (t : ?T00), foldr f0 x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f0 (f0 t x0) s H5 : forall x : ?K, scal x zero = zero H4 : forall (f0 : ?T01 -> ?T1 -> ?T1) (x0 : ?T1) (s : seq ?T01) (t : ?T01), foldr f0 x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f0 (f0 t x0) s Unable to unify "zero" with "foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (f (snd y))) (SF_h ptd, zero) (SF_t ptd))".

original: intros V f ptd Hsorted Hlast. unfold Riemann_sum. rewrite Hlast. rewrite foldr_rcons. rewrite Riemann_sum_rcons. rewrite scal_zero_r. reflexivity.
